conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
You have been a great apprentice Varthen!
There's one last trial you shall overcome!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
Behind that gate, lies the Trial of Fire.
You shall face the demons of flames and defeat
Golvon the Firelord.

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
If you succeed you will become one of us.
You will become a true wizard.

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg:
Varthen!
Are you ready to face the Trial of Fire?

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: I am ready!

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg:
Very well then!
You may enter! May the wisdom guide you!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg: Walk around with A-D

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
During fight:
Press Q to cast Arcane Blast
Press W to cast fireball!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
You can cast Arcane Blast for free 
but fireball costs 2 mana!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
Later you can upgrade your spells
and unlock new ones!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
Make sure you spend your skillpoints each time
you level up!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
You can upgrade your spells by clicking
the book icon below.

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
A treasure chest!
Press E to open it when you are near.

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
There must be a potion inside.
During battle you can press D to use
a potion and heal yourself.

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg:
Well done Varthen!
Watching you fight, reminds me
of my younger days!

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg: Still, the toughest part is yet to come!

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg:
Amazing fight!
You have defeated Golvon and the Trial of Fire!

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg:
I the Archmage of the Wizard Academy hereby
promote you to a wizard!

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg: May the wisdom guide you!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
Whenever you are defeated you return
to the last checkpoint.
enemies and chests will revive.

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
Take these potions and try again.
I know you can do it Varthen!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
Congratulations Wizard!
Use your power with wisdom!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
You have unlocked a new relic!
The Hero's Katar! You can check
your relics in your character menu!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
The more relics you have the stronger
you are! So make sure to buy and
collect as much as you can.

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
But there is no time for celebration yet.
An undead herd is heading towards Monsoon Town.

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
We have already sent Trisha to destroy
the monsters but she needs your help!

conv.name: Master Shoji
conv.msg:
Teleport to Monsoon Town!
Open your quicktravel menu by clicking
the world map icon below!

conv.name: Captain Read
conv.msg:
Hey there mate! You must be strong!
Wanna help me?
Those god damn pirates stealing my cargo!

conv.name: Captain Read
conv.msg:
Do you think you can handle them?
The pirate captain has a rare relic.
If you win you can keep it.

conv.name: Captain Read
conv.msg: We have a good wind mate!

conv.name: Captain Read
conv.msg:
Oh bloody hell I hope you are ready
for a brawl! Here they come!

conv.name: Captain Read
conv.msg: Hey! Thanks again for helping me out!

conv.name: John Black
conv.msg: I'll cut ya open ya land lover!

conv.name: John Black
conv.msg:
Mr. Miller! Teach the wizard some manners
Will ya?

conv.name: Mr. Miller
conv.msg: Y'Arrr!

conv.name: John Black
conv.msg: Daniel my boy! It's your turn.

conv.name: Daniel Taylor
conv.msg: Hello wizard! I'm the cook.

conv.name: Mr. Wilson
conv.msg: Y'arrr! Haharr!

conv.name: John Black
conv.msg:
Damn ya all useless crew!
I'll do it myself then!

conv.name: Captain Read
conv.msg:
Wow! I've never seen anyone fighting like this!
Good job mate!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Alright! Let's find Trisha!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: I'm sure Trisha will be somewhere east!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: I must save Trisha first!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Varthen! It's good to see you!
You arrived just in time.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
A necromancer is on the way
There's just no way we can win against him!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
I can open a portal and evacuate everyone.
Dozens will lose their home but right now
it's the only thing we can do.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
You hear this?
Here they come...

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
You must hold them back while
I get out everyone in safe!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I'll do my best. Now go!
May the wisdom guide you!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: Minions! Get the wizard girl!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Over my dead body!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
As you wish!
Kill this clown first!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Don't dare to underestimate me Necromancer!
You are facing a wizard!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
Hahaha! I'm so sorry Mr. Wizard!
I shall fight with you worthy of your rank!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
How about I use 1% of my power?
You deserve that much!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: Wow Mr. Wizard! You actually survived!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
Don't worry! You will be a great
soldier in my undead army after I kill you!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Damn you!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Quickly grab my hand!
I will get us out of here!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: It took you long enough!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: Run little wizard, run!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Listen to me shaman! An evil is on it's way
and he will destroy every one of us.
Thousands of orcs and humans will die!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I can stop him, but I need your relic
the Demon Eye.

conv.name: Shaman Morgzor
conv.msg:
Orcs fear no evil!
You weak human must die!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Very well then...

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
I need you to collect these 3 relic:
Demon Eye, Frozen Tentacle, Scurge Dagger.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
With the help of these, I can teleport you
inside the Trial of Darkness. Once you completed
the trial I will get you out of there.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Check your quest menu if you need help!
May the wisdom guide you Varthen!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Phew, we survived... barely.
We will be safe here in Sunwell City.
At least until the Necromancer gets here.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Not even the masters have a single chance
against that monster.
Only the Archmage posess the power to face him.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
But he can not leave the Academy!
Maybe there is a way for the two of us to
defeat him. But you won't like it...

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Explain! We can not fail Sunwell City
like we failed Monsoon Town. We must do 
anything we can!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Have you ever heard about the Trial of Darkness?
A secret dungeon in the Academy.
Not even the masters are allowed to enter.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
But hidden deep there is the Orb of Darkness.
The most powerful relic ever created.
If we could only borrow its power...

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
We might be able to defeat the Necromancer.
I say we steal the orb and save everyone with it
then we return it like nothing happened.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I don't like it at all, but
if you say there is no other way...
Where do we begin?

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
I need you to collect these 3 relic:
Demon Eye, Frozen Tentacle, Scurge Dagger.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
With the help of these, I can teleport you
inside the Trial of Darkness. Once you completed
the trial I will get you out of there.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
I suggest you to travel Graywoods
and get the Demon Eye first.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Check your quest menu if you need help!
May the wisdom guide you Varthen!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Good job Varthen! My portal spell is ready.
You might want to buy some relic from the shops
before you go.

conv.name: Murgurath
conv.msg: Hmm... fresh meat!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Time is of the essence Demon!
Let's fight!

conv.name: Murgurath
conv.msg:
I will feast
on your frozen corpse!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Ladies and Gentlemen! A special competitor
from the mysterious wizard Academy!
Let's give a warm welcome to Varthen the Wizard!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Round 1!
Varthen VS ... a chicken?

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Round 2!
Varthen VS Thilagorn!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Final Round!
Varthen VS Lucas!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg: And the winner of the Bronze Cup is Varthen!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Ladies and Gentlemen! Fan favourites
Varthen the Wizard is back! Can he
win the Silver Cup too?

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Round 1!
Varthen VS Arctic!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Round 2!
Varthen VS Sir Harold!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Final Round!
Varthen VS Mr. Ork!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Do not mess with a wizard Ladies and Gentlemen!
The winner of the Silver Cup is Varthen!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Ladies and Gentlemen!
Can Landor win the Gold Cup once more?
Can Varthen become the new champion?

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Let's find out!
Let the battle begin!
Varthen Vs Landor!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg: What an amazing battle!

conv.name: Commentator
conv.msg:
Ladies and Gentlemen! We have our
new champion! Varthen The Wizard!

conv.name: Old Lady
conv.msg:
Hey there young man!
I can reset your skill points for 50 gold!

conv.name: Oldster
conv.msg:
Hey there young man!
for 500 Gold I can give you 100 XP!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
So this is the Orb of Darkness...
Such an incredible power.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Aah my head... 
What happened? Where am I?

After all these years, a foolish human came 
to seek power. What brings you here mortal?

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Thousands will die and I lack the strength 
to help them. I need more power at any cost!

I can grant you power, more than you can imagine.
But what makes you think you are worthy?

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Your power will be in good hands.
My intentions are pure.

Wrong answer. I couldn't care less about
your intentions and your purity.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: You don't understand! I need your power!
What if I refuse to help?

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: One way or another your power shall be mine!

Hahaha! Now thats the good answer!
Very well, I will help you wizard!
But you will pay a huge price for it.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Wait! Where is the orb?

Fear not! I am within you Varthen!
And I shall not leave you, ever!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Great... Trisha! Get me out of here!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Varthen! The Necromancer is here!
We are under attack! Do you have the orb?

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Yes I have it.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Good. You must clear the city from the undeads.
I go help the guards at east. I will meet
you there.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Take care Varthen!
May the wisdom guide you!

conv.name: Landor
conv.msg: WHO'S NEXT??! COME ON!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Good job kid! I'll take it from here!
The others at east needs your help!

conv.name: Landor
conv.msg: Fine! I'll leave it up to you!

conv.name: Guard
conv.msg:
Wizard! Help!
I'm no match for this monster!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Stay behind.
I'll take it from here.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg: Varthen Help! The Necromancer is here!

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
There's more undead coming from the harbor!
Landor come with me!

conv.name: Landor
conv.msg: What about the Necromancer?

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
We wouldn't stand a chance kid
let the wizards take care of him!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Trisha go with them!

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
There's more undead coming from the harbor!
Landor come with me!

conv.name: Landor
conv.msg: What about the Necromancer?

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
We wouldn't stand a chance kid
let wizards will take care of him!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Trisha go with them!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Alright guys grab my hand!
I'll take us there!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
Ah Mr. Wizard!
It's been a while...

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Your rampage will end here.

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
You weren't much of a challenge last time.
Let me give you a little advantage.
Hit me with your best shot! I won't hit back.

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: Is that all you got weakling?

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
I knew you were weak,
but still I expected better!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: My turn now!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
I will turn you to an undead!
And I will make you to kill every
single human in this city!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: NO! I WILL STOP YOU AT ANY COST!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: I WILL DESTROY YOU NOW!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
What...? This power...
It can't be... That's Impossible!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: It's time for you to pay!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
Do not overestimate yourself just
because you got a little powerup!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: Bloodhead! Hold him up!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
Play nice with my pet.
In the meantime I return to Monsoon Town.
I have my own little dungeon there.

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
Fight with me there if you want
the wizard girl to live.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg: Varthen Help! They caught me!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: Release her or I will...

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: NOOOO!

Me and my best buddy, Varthen
against the herd of the undeads!
It will be so great!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I didn't know you were so talkative.
Who are you anyway? The spirit of the orb?

Wrong Question. The better question is
Am I real? Or is it just the evil of the orb
that messes with your mind?
Are you turning into a lunatic?

Such a brave kid!
He will be the first to die.

The time has come Varthen!
Use my power!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Can I trust you?

Hahaha! Definitely not!
But you have no other choice.

Unleash the darkness within you!
Release your rage and hatred!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: They took Trisha! I must help her!

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg: Ah you woke up!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
What happened? I was fighting with The
Necromancer, then all I can remember
is this incredible Rage!

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
So you don't remember huh?
Your skin turned gray and there was
a dark aura around you!

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
The Necromancer got scared and
ran away, taking Trisha with him.
You beat his minion easily but then

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
you totally lost control. You were
yelling and shooting fireballs everywhere!
Then all of a sudden you collapsed!

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
But hey, no one got hurt and you
saved us all!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I'm sorry for the truble!
I must head back to Monsoon Town
and save Trisha!

conv.name: Sir Bertrand
conv.msg:
Good luck, wizard!
Perhaps you should visit the shops and buy
some potions and relics before you go!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I can't use the power of the orb
otherwise people will get hurt by my hand!
Great power comes with a great price!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Where is Trisha?!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
Relax Mr. Wizard! She's fine.
At least for now!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Release her! Now!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: You have to defeat me first!

You can not win this fight alone.
Use my power, Varthen!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
A power I can't control.
It's just too dangerous.

Foolish wizard!
Let's see how far can you go without me.

What are you afraid of?
Remember when you beat the hell out
of that orc shaman for his relic?

Remember when you stole the orb from the wizards
just to save thousands of people? We need that
kind of boldness now, my friend!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: Will you ever shut up?

I can feel the rage inside you!
Let it free and use my power!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
What if I can't come back this time?
I will hurt people! I can't let that happen!

People will get hurt if you lose this battle!
Think about them! Think about Trisha!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: I must find another way to win!

We both know there is no other way!
You are just too weak!
You are nothing without me!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: No!

YOU ARE JUST A WEAK MORTAL!
USE MY POWER YOU FOOL!
USE IT!!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: AAAAAAAAARGH!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: It is over now, Necromancer!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
You can not stop me, wizard!
I've defeated everyone in my way!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: Everyone but me!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
You may defeat me, wizard!
But I already won!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: You don't look like a winner!

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg:
It is all according to her plan!
She completely played you! Hahaha

conv.name: The Necromancer
conv.msg: HAHAHAHAHAAHAAAA!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: Who was he talking about?

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
He is right! I made you to steal the
Orb of Darkness but it was not
a powerful relic. It was a prison.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
A prison to keep the one true evil
locked down. It was built by the Archmage
and he was keeping it safe for centuries.

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
And now you, his own student ruins
everything.

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: You used me?

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg: Yes.

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg:
But why? You are a wizard!
You are one of us!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
I only became a wizard to execute my plan.
The age of humanity is over, Varthen.
It is the age of Demons now!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg:
You traitor! We were supposed to save
the world! I respected you! I WORSHIPPED YOU!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
I know you did! You almost made it
too easy! And now your soul is tainted by him!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Soon you will lose control over yourself!
And he shall rule this world once more!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: YOU WILL PAY FOR THIS!

conv.name: Trisha
conv.msg:
Yes! Release your anger!
Let him free!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: AAAAAAARRRGGH!!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
So you are the evil the
Archmage fought against!
All those stories are true!
Indeed.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I just wanted to become someone like him
A hero... a savior... a legend.
I truly ruined everything, didn't I?

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Someone like me will never become
someone like him.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg: So what's next?

I will take control over your
body and I will destroy every life
in this world.

The Archmage is old now.
There is no one else who is strong enough
to stop me.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
You are also not the same you used to be.
You might have my body but from now on,
I will be a part of you.

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
I will be there in every careless second
I will be there to fight and regain control.
And then I will make you lose.
You can try, my friend.

conv.name: Archmage Tyren
conv.msg:
Varthen! My dear apprentice! What have you done?
Hand over the orb! We can still fix this!

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg:
My old enemy. You are too late!
And the name is not Varthen anymore.

conv.name: Posessed Varthen
conv.msg: I am The Dark One!

conv.name: Varthen
conv.msg:
Oh a relic shop! Perhaps I should
buy something before I go!
